FS: I have the following cards for sale. All prices include shipping with delivery confirmation. Perfer paypal no fee, check, money order also fine. If flip is shown, card will come with flip. Thanks for looking. Ralph   [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

Note: I will be out for awhile this afternoon, all e-mails, PM's will be answered in order and will reply to all... Thanks

Groom EPDG - Slighlty oversized - SOLD
McIntyre - Sweet Caporal 150 - SOLD
Merkle - Piedmont 350-460 Miscut Back - SOLD
Schlei - Piedmont 350 -Was SGC40 Narrow Factory Cut - $30 -- Sale Pending *card is not trimmed, card has been/will grade numerically

Perfer to sell next two together. They both have the same back markings (don't think it is a stamp) Looks like a civil war soilder waving a flag, also has a number written on card. Hard to see Fiene in scan, sorry.  SOLD
Sweeny - Piedmont 350
Fiene - Piemont 350
